title: Add To Cart Interaction
description: An interactive add-to-cart button animation. This can be used to enhance the user experience on e-commerce websites by providing a smooth animation when a user clicks the 'Add to Cart' button. The animation makes the cart icon visually respond and gives feedback to the user that the item has been added to the cart.

title: Gradient Text
description: A gradient text effect with hover animation. This effect makes text appear with a smooth, vibrant gradient that transitions on hover. It's perfect for adding attention-grabbing headlines or decorative text to a website.

title: Balaji Animation
description: A shining text effect with a tropical flower background. This effect can be used to create eye-catching titles or logos that stand out with a glowing animation, perfect for modern websites or portfolios.

title: Shaking Button Animation On Hover
description: A button with a shaking animation effect when hovered over. This can be used to draw attention to a button, making it interactive and engaging for users. Itâ€™s perfect for call-to-action buttons on websites.

title: Slide In Social Icons
description: A collection of social media icons that slide in from the side on hover. This effect adds dynamic and modern social media icons that attract users to engage with your social media pages.
html:
• Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Instagram
  • Github

title: Social Icon Hover Effects
description: A set of social media icons with hover effects including scaling and color changes. This effect adds interactivity to social media icons, making them more engaging for users and encouraging interaction.

title: Rollback Toggle
description: This is a toggle switch with a rollback effect. When the toggle is switched on, it will automatically revert after a set time. The `RollbackToggle` class enables this feature by listening for the toggle's change event and initiating the rollback after a specified delay. It can be used for any toggle functionality that needs to automatically return to its original state after a certain time.
